item.description:
This is a dress-up party of course I'm sure there will be a lack of enforcement if you choose to come as yourself. Please bring food and drink and this is a kid friendly event...


DIRECTIONS:
The address is 15 Nantucket Ct. (Meetup changes it to 15 Nantucket Pl). Unfortunately it is a new street and cannot be found on Google maps etc. If you go to Google maps and type in 1 Martin St, Nantucket Ct is directly across Henry Law Ave.
item.name: Halloween Party
